Package tan.jerry.process_future_movement.service

Class ProcessFutureMovementTaskletProcessor

java.lang.Object
tan.jerry.process_future_movement.service.ProcessFutureMovementTaskletProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProcessFutureMovementService
@Service public class ProcessFutureMovementTaskletProcessor extends Object implements ProcessFutureMovementService
ProcessFutureMovementTaskletProcessor is a service class responsible for processing the input data and generating a daily summary report. The class reads input records, calculates transaction amounts, and produces an output CSV file.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProcessFutureMovementTaskletProcessor

      public ProcessFutureMovementTaskletProcessor()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method for executing the tasklet processor. Initiates the process of reading input data and generating the summary report.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not used).

    • process

      public Map<String,Double> process()
      Processes the input data by reading records, calculating transaction amounts, and writing the results to an output CSV file. This method also handles checking and replacing periods in product information.
      Returns:
      A map representing the client-product keys and their corresponding total transaction amounts.

    • parseInputRecord

      private static InputRecord parseInputRecord(String line)
      Parses a line of text into an InputRecord object. Each field in the InputRecord is mapped from a specific position in the line.
      Parameters:
      line - The line of text representing a record.
      Returns:
      The InputRecord object populated with data from the line.

    • getClientInformation

      private static String getClientInformation(InputRecord record)
      Constructs a client information string from an InputRecord.
      Parameters:
      record - The InputRecord containing client data.
      Returns:
      A string combining client type, client number, account number, and subaccount number.

    • getProductInformation

      private static String getProductInformation(InputRecord record)
      Constructs a product information string from an InputRecord.
      Parameters:
      record - The InputRecord containing product data.
      Returns:
      A string combining exchange code, product group code, symbol, and expiration date.

    • calculateTransactionAmount

      private static double calculateTransactionAmount(InputRecord record)
      Calculates the total transaction amount based on the quantities and their signs from an InputRecord. This method considers the `ignoreSignIndicators` configuration from BatchJobConfig.
      Parameters:
      record - The InputRecord containing quantity and sign information.
      Returns:
      The calculated total transaction amount.

    • writeOutputFile

      private static void writeOutputFile(String outputFilePath, Map<String,Double> transactionMap)
      Writes the output CSV file containing the client-product information and their total transaction amounts.
      Parameters:
      outputFilePath - The path to the output CSV file.
      transactionMap - A map containing client-product keys and their corresponding total transaction amounts.

    • calculateDailySummary

      public static Map<String,Double> calculateDailySummary()
      Calculates the daily summary report by executing the main process and returning the report map.
      Returns:
      A map representing the client-product keys and their corresponding total transaction amounts.
